statements: DELETE FROM Volunteers WHERE name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM Volunteers WHERE id = 101 AND name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Volunteers WHERE email = 'jane@example.com' AND availability LIKE '%weekdays%';

DELETE FROM schedules WHERE event_id = 300 AND start_time < '12:00:00';
